DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects events from Nortel Contivity secure IP gateways (200 series).

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+" dst="[\d.]+" msg="Traffic Log" note="Traffic Log" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Traffic Log" duration=\d+ send=\d+ rcvd=\d+ dir="[\w:]+" protoID=1 proto="[-\w]+" trans="\w+"

\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="Traffic Log" note="Traffic Log" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Traffic Log" duration=\d+ send=\d+ rcvd=\d+ dir="[\w:]+" protoID=\d+ proto="https?" trans="\w+"

\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="Traffic Log" note="Traffic Log" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Traffic Log" duration=\d+ send=\d+ rcvd=\d+ dir="[\w:]+" protoID=\d+ proto="(?:netbios[-\w]*|domain)" trans="\w+"

\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="Traffic Log" note="Traffic Log" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Traffic Log" duration=\d+ send=\d+ rcvd=\d+ dir="[\w:]+" protoID=\d+ proto="(?:bootp[cs]|snmp-trap|snmp)" trans="\w+"

\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="Traffic Log" note="Traffic Log" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Traffic Log" duration=\d+ send=\d+ rcvd=\d+ dir="[\w:]+" protoID=\d+ proto="(?:smtp|pop3)" trans="\w+"
\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="Traffic Log" note="Traffic Log" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Traffic Log" duration=\d+ send=\d+ rcvd=\d+ dir="[\w:]+" protoID=\d+ proto="ftp" trans="\w+"

\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="Traffic Log" note="Traffic Log" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Traffic Log" duration=\d+ send=\d+ rcvd=\d+ dir="[\w:]+" protoID=\d+ proto="(?:ssh|telnet)" trans="\w+"

\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="Traffic Log" note="Traffic Log" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Traffic Log" duration=\d+ send=\d+ rcvd=\d+ dir="[\w:]+" protoID=\d+ proto="isakmp" trans="\w+"

\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="Traffic Log" note="Traffic Log" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Traffic Log" duration=\d+ send=\d+ rcvd=\d+ dir="[\w:]+" protoID=6 proto="[-\w]+" trans="\w+"

\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="Traffic Log" note="Traffic Log" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Traffic Log" duration=\d+ send=\d+ rcvd=\d+ dir="[\w:]+" protoID=17 proto="[-\w]+" trans="\w+"

\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="Traffic Log" note="Traffic Log" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Traffic Log" duration=\d+ send=\d+ rcvd=\d+ dir="[\w:]+" protoID=\d+ proto="[-\w]+" trans="\w+"
\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+" dst="[\d.]+" msg="Firewall (?:default policy|rule match): ICMP [^"]+" note="ACCESS [A-Z]+" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Access Control"

FastFormatter.format: ICMP CODE Destination is Administratively Prohibited
ICMP CODE Destination is Administratively Prohibited
ICMP CODE Destination Unreachable for Service
ICMP CODE Destination Host Unreachable for Service
ICMP CODE Precedence Cutoff in Effect
ICMP CODE Redirect for the Host
ICMP CODE Redirect for Service and Network
ICMP CODE Redirect for Service and Host
ICMP CODE Alternate Address for Host
ICMP CODE Time to Live exceeded in Transit
ICMP CODE Fragment Reassembly Time Exceeded
ICMP CODE Pointer indicates the error
ICMP CODE Missing a Required Option

FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="Firewall (?:default policy|rule match): TCP [^"]+" note="ACCESS [A-Z]+" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Access Control"
\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="Firewall (?:default policy|rule match): UDP [^"]+" note="ACCESS [A-Z]+" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Access Control"
\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="Firewall (?:default policy|rule match): [^"]+" note="ACCESS [A-Z]+" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Access Control"
\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="[^"]+" note="WEB [A-Z]+" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="\w+ Web Sites"
\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+" dst="[\d.]+" msg="[^"]+" note="IPSEC" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="IPSec"
\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+" dst="[\d.]+" msg="[^"]+" note="IKE" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="IKE"
\d+ [-\w.]+ msg="Rule \[.+\] (?:input )?idle time out, disconnect" note="IPSEC" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="IPSec"
\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="Remote Management: FTP [\w ]+" note="ACCESS [A-Z]+" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Remote Management"
\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="Remote Management: [\w ]+" note="ACCESS [A-Z]+" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Remote Management"

FastPattern.description: 22, ConfigurationTrafficAudit: System Maintenance, DHCP server assigns
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ msg="DHCP server assigns [\d.]+ to [-\w.]+" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="System Maintenance"
\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+" dst="[\d.]+" msg="[-/\w ]+: ICMP[^"]+" note="ACCESS [A-Z]+" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="ICMP"

FastFormatter.format: ICMP CODE Destination is Administratively Prohibited
ICMP CODE Destination is Administratively Prohibited
ICMP CODE Destination Unreachable for Service
ICMP CODE Destination Host Unreachable for Service
ICMP CODE Precedence Cutoff in Effect
ICMP CODE Redirect for the Host
ICMP CODE Redirect for Service and Network
ICMP CODE Redirect for Service and Host
ICMP CODE Alternate Address for Host
ICMP CODE Time to Live exceeded in Transit
ICMP CODE Fragment Reassembly Time Exceeded
ICMP CODE Pointer indicates the error
ICMP CODE Missing a Required Option

FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+" dst="[\d.]+" msg="NetBIOS packet filtered!" note="ACCESS [A-Z]+" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="Packet Filter"
\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:\d*" msg="Time set from NTP server: [-\w.]+, offset: [-+]?\d+ sec" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="System Maintenance"
\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+:?\d*" dst="[\d.]+:?\d*" msg="[\w ]+, sent TCP RST" note="[A-Z ]+" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="TCP Reset"
\d+ [-\w.]+ src="[\d.]+" msg="Successful HTTP login" note="User:[^"]+" devID="[A-F\d]+" cat="System Maintenance"
